content:
When I import an EvidenceReport resource into a HAPI 5.2.0 server the "title" field is dropped after being validated. "title" isn't explicitly defined in the EvidenceReport Resource Structure Definition and it's inherited from ancestors. I assumed that those elements would be inherited and would be valid for the EvidenceReport resource, is that assumption correct or not? Or is this a server configuration issue?

http://build.fhir.org/evidencereport.html
